column3: DMAC Channel Enable Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0100 + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Pause Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0104 + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Start Address Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0108 + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Configuration Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x010C + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Current Source Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0110 + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Current Destination Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0114 + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Byte Counter Left Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0118 + N*0x0040
DMAC Channel Parameter Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x011C + N*0x0040
DMAC Mode Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0128 + N*0x0040
DMAC Former Descriptor Address Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x012C + N*0x0040
DMAC Package Number Register N (N = 0 to 15) 0x0130 + N*0x0040
